name: Shiva
description:
"Shiva" is a 2D experimental game prototype, based on real events and inspired by my grandfather Moshe. You play as Itamar, a young kid arriving at his grandfather's Shiva and finds a mysterious pass into his lost memories.

Please tell me what you think about this game! I want to keep improving it so please share your thoughts/ideas/questions. it's a very personal project for me and if you like it and want to see more I will appreciate any support and donations! 

Thank you and I hope you'll enjoy the game!
